title: 4 Rare 80s Albums [Part 31]
description:
So here is the much sought after record, Paradox, along with three other rare gems. A little quiz for you. Who was the frontman of the band The Drivers? and what band did he go on forming in 1985? Their debut single was a smash hit all over the world. no cheating please. close your discogs pages! Also make sure to give Pukka Orchestra a good and uninterrupted listen. Beautiful record. The Bongos Must be known to most of you, if not all. Enjoy.


Paradox - Paradox  [1989]

The Bongos - Numbers With Wings-Beat Hotel

The Drivers - Short Cuts [1983]

The Pukka Orchestra - The Pukka Orchestra
